verses.plain: O God, thou art my God; early will I seek thee: my soul thirsteth for thee, my flesh longeth for thee in a dry and thirsty land, where no water is;

tokens.t: O God, thou
my God; early will I seek thee: my soul thirsteth for thee, my flesh longeth for thee in a dry and thirsty land, where no water is;

verses.plain: To see thy power and thy glory, so as I have seen thee in the sanctuary.

tokens.t: To see thy power and thy glory, so
I have seen thee in the sanctuary.

verses.plain: Because thy lovingkindness is better than life, my lips shall praise thee.

tokens.t: Because thy lovingkindness
better than life, my lips shall praise thee.

verses.plain: Thus will I bless thee while I live: I will lift up my hands in thy name.

tokens.t: Thus will I bless thee while I live: I will lift up my hands in thy name.

verses.plain: My soul shall be satisfied as with marrow and fatness; and my mouth shall praise thee with joyful lips:

tokens.t: My soul shall be satisfied as
marrow and fatness; and my mouth shall praise
with joyful lips:

verses.plain: When I remember thee upon my bed, and meditate on thee in the night watches.

tokens.t: When I remember thee upon my bed,
meditate on thee in the
watches.

verses.plain: Because thou hast been my help, therefore in the shadow of thy wings will I rejoice.

tokens.t: Because thou hast been my help, therefore in the shadow of thy wings will I rejoice.

verses.plain: My soul followeth hard after thee: thy right hand upholdeth me.

tokens.t: My soul followeth hard after thee: thy right hand upholdeth me.

verses.plain: But those that seek my soul, to destroy it, shall go into the lower parts of the earth.

tokens.t: But those
seek my soul, to destroy
, shall go into the lower parts of the earth.

verses.plain: They shall fall by the sword: they shall be a portion for foxes.

tokens.t: They shall fall by the sword: they shall be a portion for foxes.

verses.plain: But the king shall rejoice in God; every one that sweareth by him shall glory: but the mouth of them that speak lies shall be stopped.

tokens.t: But the king shall rejoice in God; every one that sweareth by him shall glory: but the mouth of them that speak lies shall be stopped.

footnotes.text: They shall fall…: Heb. They shall make him run out like water by the hands of
